headline: Morgan Stanley Places Bets on These 2 Energy Stocks
summary: If the rise of Donald Trump has taught us anything about politics, it’s to expect the unexpected – but with his second term as President just a few days away, there are a few things that we can confidently predict. Prime among these is a drastic change in American energy policy. A supportive policy for energy will likely include both new exploration and new drilling activities – and that will open up plenty of opportunities as oil and gas companies expand their revenue bases.
